line.comment: * Sun 23 can cause the game to crash
* 1 & 2 = Debris (type 1 is too big and is easily confused with a real asteroid).
* The max jump beacons in any given sector
* Check if this sector is already at the max existing links
* Get a random sector that has fewer than a set amount of existing links
* Note the link could be the sector itself! This is done purposefully

sval.val: Sun 23 can cause the game to crash
1 & 2 = Debris (type 1 is too big and is easily confused with a real asteroid).
The max jump beacons in any given sector
Check if this sector is already at the max existing links
Get a random sector that has fewer than a set amount of existing links
Note the link could be the sector itself! This is done purposefully
